directions: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, creamy salad dressing, sugar, salt, and black pepper in a salad bowl. If salad seems too sweet, add more salad dressing; if too tart, add more sugar. Chill before serving.
ingredients: 1 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®), or more to taste
2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Creamy Cucumber and Tomato Salad
